plot: Two friends struggle to crack a code they've promised to Champagne Charlie a ruthless gangster before going on the run to avoid finding out the real reason for her nick-name.
title: Banana Pearl
plot_es: Two friends struggle to crack a code they've promised to Champagne Charlie a ruthless gangster before going on the run to avoid finding out the real reason for her nick-name.
plot_en: Two friends struggle to crack a code they've promised to Champagne Charlie a ruthless gangster before going on the run to avoid finding out the real reason for her nick-name.
